article_title: Americans Aren't Going To The Doctor And It's Costing Us

article_metadata.description: Just four trips on average to the doctor’s office aren’t enough to put a dent in rising U.S. health care costs when compared to other wealthy countries that have lower rates of obesity and other chronic conditions that need medical attention, a new study shows. An analysis from researchers at the [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
